summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding with the International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 27, amending Articles 15 and 21 of the collective bargaining agreement between the City and the union (Ordinance 109904) to establish a long term, non-occupational disability insurance program covering certain Fire Fighters; authorizing the Director of Personnel to execute and administer such insurance program and providing payment therefor.
